widgets.name: Compliance Overview
widgets.text: Shows the compliance status across all cloud resources.

widgets.name: Risk Assessment
widgets.text: Displays risk levels of different cloud services.

widgets.name: Alerts Summary
widgets.text: Summarizes all security alerts and their current status.

widgets.name: Top Vulnerabilities
widgets.text: Lists the top vulnerabilities detected in the cloud infrastructure.

widgets.name: Policy Violations
widgets.text: Tracks violations against defined cloud policies.

widgets.name: Remediation Status
widgets.text: Shows the progress of ongoing remediation activities.

widgets.name: Intrusion Detection
widgets.text: Monitors suspicious activities within the cloud environment.

widgets.name: Log Analysis
widgets.text: Analyzes logs for potential security issues.

widgets.name: Threat Intelligence
widgets.text: Provides information on emerging threats related to cloud infrastructure.
